name: Spent Casings
description:
A simple game where you need to keep moving to survive. Enemies will spawn and try to stop you from moving, and you'll need to dodge and shoot to survive as long as possible. But there's a catch. Dead enemies and wasted bullets will pile up on the stage, making it even harder. How long can you last? 

Left click to start the game.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Bomb

Move over powerups to pick them up.
